function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for airborne cross-infection due to low air velocity and disturbance of boundary layer around individuals","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in dynamic environments with moving and coughing individuals","Mitigation":"Use of air purifiers, increase in air change rate, and implementation of infection control measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems with higher air change rates, and air quality monitoring systems","People":"Occupants in the built environment, particularly in dynamic spaces with moving individuals","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"}]}
